# cloudtemple_object_storage_roles (Data Source)

Retrieves all available object storage roles.

To query this datasource you will need the `object-storage_read` role.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# List all available object storage roles
data "cloudtemple_object_storage_roles" "example" {}

# Output the roles
output "available_roles" {
  value = data.cloudtemple_object_storage_roles.example.roles
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `roles` (List of Object) The list of available roles. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--roles))

<a id="nestedatt--roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `roles`

Read-Only:

- `description` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `permissions` (List of String)
